name: JewelCase Maker File
summary: A JWC file contains a design for a CD jewel case created by NTI JewelCase Maker, a Windows program used to create jewel case designs. It stores information about a jewel case design, which may include images, graphics, and text. JWC files typically contain multiple designs, which include the front, inside, and back of a jewel case, a CD/DVD label, a DVD insert, and a DVD cover design.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
